title: Trunyan Village Experience (Half-day)
overview: Visit Trunyan Village, known for its unique burial traditions and ancient Bali Aga culture.

stops.description: Arrive by boat and explore the village, learn about the open-air burial tradition.

title: Trunyan Village & Lake Batur Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Trunyan Village and the scenic Lake Batur area.

stops.description: Arrive by boat, explore the village and burial site.
Tour Lake Batur, visit hot springs or local temples.
